title: Discover gets new line with same info on username/status if switch between username/status [develop]
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: Discover screen contains status updates (if status has #hashtag). Currently, Discover contains exactly same lines with same statuses when user 
- just views the status/username and taps on them in a drawer or
- change a profile picture without changing status or
- change username without changing status 

![screenshot_20170910-141600](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/30248621-d7893ff2-9633-11e7-91d8-c079424bfb8a.png)
![screenshot_20170910-141804](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6584810/30248620-d7867b64-9633-11e7-95c7-a5987284d5a1.png)




#### Expected behavior

1 . only when status is updated and contains different information then Discover gets new line with this updated status. 
2. If username or picture is updated and status is the same then all relevant lines (from this user) are updated and contain new picture/username. No new lines are added if status is the same.

#### Actual behavior
Discover contains exactly same lines with same statuses when user 
- just views the status/username and taps on them in a drawer or
- change a profile picture without changing status or
- change username without changing status 

### Reproduction
https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/6522867/sessions/6/?accessToken=pDbjO4NzsUZCfvHrdfojtnMCbmI

you should have an account with empty Discover tab (so, no contacts have hashtags in status and you do not have hashtag in status yet)

case #1 tap on username and status in drawer:
- Open Status and login
- Check Discover tab - it's empty
- Open Drawer and update status, so it contains #tag 
- Check Discover screen, now it contains 1 line with updated status
- Open drawer
- Tap on username
- Tap on status
- Tap on username
- close drawer
- check discover screen, if issue exists then there will be 2 lines with identical information

case#2 profile picture without changing status 
- Open Status and login
- Check Discover tab - it's empty
- Open Drawer and update status, so it contains #tag 
- Check Discover screen, now it contains 1 line with updated status
- Open Profile
- Edit Profile
- Edit picture
- Select a picture or make a photo
- Save changes
- Open drawer tab, if issue exists then there will be 2 lines with identical information

### Additional Information
* Status version: develop 0.9.10-84-g3e1d7311+ 
* Operating System: 
Real device Samsung Galaxy S6, Android 6.0.1
Real device iPhone 6s, iOS 10.3.3
